quests.name: At Your Service
objectives: Go to Chez Remy with Lumiere.
Talk to Remy with Lumiere.

Find items for Lumiere in the Beauty and the Beast Realm:
  ‧ 1 French Bread in the backroom.
  ‧ 3 French Spices in the garden.
  ‧ 3 French Recipe Books in the library.
Return to Chez Remy with the French items.
Talk to Remy.

Clean up Chez Remy.
  ‧ Remove all 6 broken dishes.
Meet Tiana and Lumiere inside Tiana's Palace.
Tiana and Lumiere seem to be preparing something...
Talk to Lumiere in the kitchen of Tiana's Palace.

Gather materials for the romantic evening at Tiana's Palace:
  ‧ 40 Stone.
  ‧ 25 Softwood.
  ‧ 6 Green Rising Penstemon.
  ‧ 3 Purple Hydrangea.

Make sure to have all Ingredients for the French desserts:
  ‧ 3 Milk.
  ‧ 2 Egg.
  ‧ 1 Sugarcane.
  ‧ 1 Vanilla.
  ‧ 1 Butter.
  ‧ 1 Wheat.
  ‧ 1 Cheese.
  ‧ 3 Any Fruit.
Cook some French Desserts for Tiana
Crepe.
Pastry Cream and Fruits.
Soufflé.
Craft the Romantic Arch.
Place the Romantic Arch in front of Tiana's Palace.
Return to Tiana's Palace.
Talk to Lumiere in the dining room in Tiana's Palace.

Clean up Tiana's Palace:
  ‧ Remove the 6 broken dishes.
  ‧ Pick up the 3 floating cutlery.
  ‧ Catch all the 3 flying items.
Bring all the haunted items to Lumiere.

quests.name: Here, There, and Everywhere
objectives:
Talk to Villagers about Tiana's Palace.
  ‧ Minnie Mouse.
  ‧ The Beast.

Investigate alongside Lumiere:
  ‧ Look for 5 ghostly clues in both Remy's and Tiana's restaurants.
  ‧ Return to Lumiere with the clues you found.
Talk to Jack Skellington.

Find the spell materials for Jack Skellington.
  ‧ 1 Pumpkin Soup.
  ‧ 2 Shiny Ruby.
  ‧ 2 Shiny Sapphire.
  ‧ 10 Night Shard.
  ‧ 10 Purified Night Shard.
Return to Tiana's Palace with the materials.
Bring the spell materials to Jack Skellington inside Tiana's Palace.
Put on the Masquerade Mask to see more of the Here and There.

A Here and There Spirit was here...
  ‧ Investigate and remove the 5 Here and There tracks in Tiana's Palace.

Clear the Here and There burrow in Tiana's kitchen.
  ‧ Make sure to wear the Masquerade Mask.

Something escaped the Here and There burrow!
  ‧ Follow the spirit trail outside of Tiana's Palace.
The Here and There Spirit is now loose in the Village! Return to Lumiere.

quests.name: Spirit Hunters
objectives: Meet the investigation crew in Beast's Castle.
Talk to Lumiere along with Belle, Tiana, and Cogsworth in the Beast's Castle.

Cogsworth felt an unnatural cold breeze in the Mystical Cave on Dazzle Beach.
  ‧ Meet Cogsworth in the Mystical Cave.
  ‧ Talk to Cogsworth.

Cogsworth felt an unnatural cold breeze in the Mystical Cave on Dazzle Beach.
  ‧ Put on the Masquerade Mask to search for clues.
  ‧ Follow paw tracks to find the clue.
  ‧ Return to Cogsworth with the Frozen Red Passion Lily.

Tiana saw strange blue lights within the Vitalys Mines on the Sunlit Plateau.
  ‧ Meet Tiana in the Vitalys Mines.

Tiana saw strange blue lights within the Vitalys Mines on the Sunlit Plateau.
  ‧ Put on the Masquerade Mask to search for clues.
  ‧ Follow paw tracks to find the clue.
  ‧ Return to Tiana with the Frozen Thorn.

Belle caught a glimpse of the Here and There Spirit inside Elsa's Ice Cavern.
  ‧ Put on the Masquerade Mask to search for clues.
  ‧ Investigate the Ice Cavern for one more clue.

Make sure you have all the clues in your Inventory:
  ‧ Frozen Book.
  ‧ Frozen Red Passion Lily.
  ‧ Frozen Thorn.
Talk to Lumiere about the clues you found.

Investigate the secret chamber in the Frosted Heights.
  ‧ (Optional) Follow more (3) tracks using the Masquerade Mask.

You found the Here and There Spirit's den!
  ‧ Pick up the Clay Paw Print.
Clear the 3 Here and There thorns in the secret chamber in the Frosted Heights.

Dark Symbols have appeared in the secret chamber.
  ‧ Talk to Lumiere.
Find the Book of Symbols in the Dark Castle's first-floor library.
Bring the Book of Symbols to Belle.

Gather the necessary materials for the Binding Spell:
  ‧ 12 Dream Shard.
  ‧ 18 Here and There Debris.
  ‧ 1 Clay Paw Print.
  ‧ 20 Stone.
  ‧ 3 Crystal.
Return to the Frosted Heights' secret chamber with the spell materials.
Bring the spell materials to Belle in the secret chamber.

The Binding Spell is ready:
  ‧ Use the 3 crystals to rotate and match the Symbols on the floor.

Is the Here and There Spirit a... fox?
  ‧ Talk to Lumiere.

quests.name: Long Lost Loves
objectives: Visit the Here and There Fox in the secret chamber.
Talk to Lumiere and the Here and There Fox.
Pick up the Memory given by the Here and There Fox.
Talk to Lumiere.

Feed some critters:
  ‧ A raccoon.
  ‧ A fox.

Did feeding critters work?
  ‧ Use the Fox's previous Memory to find and search the next Memory location.
Talk to Lumiere.
Bring Villagers their favorite gifts

Another Memory from the Fox must have appeared...
  ‧ Use the previous Memory to find and search the next Memory location.
Talk to Lumiere.

Find a way to return to the Dark Grove.
  ‧ Talk to Merlin.

Gather the materials needed to craft the Fox and Raccoon Sculpture:
  ‧ Lumiere's Flame from Lumiere.
  ‧ 12 Clay.
  ‧ 12 Dream Shard.
  ‧ 2 Red Rose from the Beast's Greenhouse.
Craft the Fox and Raccoon Sculpture.

Find more Dark Symbols in the Forest of Valor to re-open the portal.
  ‧ Find the Dark Symbols in the Forest of Valor.
  ‧ Place the Fox and Raccoon Sculpture near the Dark Symbols.
Enter the Dark Portal in the Forest of Valor.

Find the Here and There Raccoon in the Dark Grove.
  ‧ Follow the guiding light!

The Here and There Raccoon looks strange...
  ‧ Talk to Lumiere.
Give the Clay Paw Print to the Here and There Raccoon.

The Here and There Raccoon seems to remember the fox again!
  ‧ Follow Lumiere and the Raccoon to the Dark Grove's exit.
Exit the Dark Grove with Lumiere and meet near the Dark Portal.
Talk to Lumiere.

The Here and There critters are reunited!
  ‧ Take a picture of the reunion with all your friends.
Talk to Lumiere.
